definition: (completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly

sentences.english: My friend said she never forget the delicious of the soup.
sentences.chinese: 朋友说，她这辈子也忘不了那锅鱼汤的鲜美。

sentences.english: Not forget that the wall of the room a few obtrusive calligraphy.
sentences.chinese: 忘不了房间墙壁上那几个碍眼的毛笔字。

sentences.english: He was born at nine- nineteen at night. I will never forget that night.
sentences.chinese: 他在晚九点十九分出生我永远也忘不了那个晚上。

sentences.english: The mixture tasted horrible. It was first chemistry lesson.
sentences.chinese: 我永远忘不了我白勺第一节化学课。

sentences.english: I'll never forget the day when I met Mr. Liu.
sentences.chinese: 我忘不了遇到刘老师的那天。

sentences.english: I'll never forget the time I lost money.
sentences.chinese: 我永远也忘不了那次丢钱的事。

sentences.english: The sight was so beautiful that we would never forget it.
sentences.chinese: 我永远也忘不了那美丽壮观的景象。

sentences.english: Cannot forget the falling leaves of despair.
sentences.chinese: 也忘不了那花开的烦脑。

sentences.english: I shall always carry with me the memory of this child's tortured face.
sentences.chinese: 我将永远忘不了这小孩的满脸苦相。

sentences.english: I can not forget is that the sedan chair sitting in the drive when Luoyang.
sentences.chinese: 我忘不了的，是坐着花轿在洛阳兜风的时候。

sentences.english: Crowds arrived, and I shall never forget the grand sight.
sentences.chinese: 人群蜂涌而至，我永远忘不了那种宏大的场面。

sentences.english: The rundown rail services of America are something I try, vainly, to forget.
sentences.chinese: 美国铁路交通破落是一件我想忘也忘不了的事。

sentences.english: I'll never forget the day they discovered me.
sentences.chinese: 我永远忘不了他们找到我的那天。

sentences.english: Your heart or forget him, don't in the strengthened themselves it's useless.
sentences.chinese: 你心里还是忘不了他，别在逞强了，没用的。

sentences.english: The scene of thousands of steeds galloping I would never forget all my life.
sentences.chinese: 那万马奔腾的场面我这一辈子也忘不了。
我永远也忘不了那里的大雪。

definition: lit. carved in bones and engraved in the heart (idiom)/fig. etched in one's memory/unforgettable
to remain fresh in one's memory (idiom)
engraved in one's heart and carved in one's bones (idiom); to remember a benefactor as long as one lives/undying gratitude
to miss/to remember with longing/to long to see again
not to have room to put sth/to be unable to let go
to miss/to yearn day and night
to release (tension)/relief (from suspense)/to dispel (usu. with negative, unable to forget)
